text:
Hello!

I am looking for a way to send emails to contacts triggered via a JavaScript function.

Basically, I have a page that contains a video and in that video a banner will pop out on a specific timing and when that banner comes out I want to send emails to the contact who's currently watching the video.

I would really appreciate any guidance :smile:
Page templates can be found from Design Manager. This knowledge base article might help you <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cos-general/add-default-content-to-your-template>
